definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing

sentences.english: His mine collapsed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 但他的矿井再一次事故中倒塌。

sentences.english: As of noon on Saturday, the water had risen to within 20 meters of the mine opening.
sentences.chinese: 截至星期六中午，水位已上升到距矿井口约20米处。

sentences.english: O groundwater recharges the mine through buried outcrop of bedrock laterally.
sentences.chinese: 奥灰水通过基岩隐伏露头侧向补给矿井。

sentences.english: A secondary mine passageway between two main shafts or tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 矿井中连接两条大隧道的小巷道。

sentences.english: A base-station applied in mine monitoring system is a multi-task and real time system of information acquiring and transferring.
sentences.chinese: 矿井监控分站是一个多任务的实时采集与传输系统。

sentences.english: A coal mining in thin seam is an inevitable issue of coal mining in many coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 薄煤层开采是许多矿井煤炭开采中不可避免的问题。

sentences.english: We have used this system to clean mine waters at various mines," Eero Soininen, Outokumpu's mine reclamation manager, told Reuters."Around
sentences.chinese: 我们已经利用这种方法清理了各种不同矿井的矿井水。

sentences.english: We have used this system to clean mine waters at various mines," Eero Soininen, Outokumpu's mine reclamation manager, told Reuters."Around
sentences.chinese: 我们已经利用这种方法清理了各种不同矿井的矿井水。

sentences.english: The mine which caved in during the earthquake was soon repaired and resumed production.
sentences.chinese: 在地震中坍陷的矿井很快修复了，并恢复了生产。

sentences.english: All known methods of the precision check for resistance measurement of mine ventilation networks by barometry are summarized and analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了已有的矿井风网阻力测量精度的检验方法。

sentences.english: In this peper an electromagnetic non-rope hoist is showed.
sentences.chinese: 为矿井提升展现一种电磁式无绳提升机。

sentences.english: In this paper, the relation between skip shaft and mine ventilation is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了箕斗并与矿井通风的关系。

sentences.english: This paper introduced an optimizing method and optimization program used for selecting mine fan by computer.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种矿井扇风机的计算机优选方法及优选程序。

sentences.english: Taoyuan Coal Mine is the threatened mine by manifold groundwater.
sentences.chinese: 桃园煤矿是一个受多种地下水害威胁的矿井。

sentences.english: The successful experience of coal mine technology reform is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了毛郢孜煤矿进行矿井技术改造的成功经验。

sentences.english: A composite picture of the 33 miners trapped in the San Jose mine.
sentences.chinese: 阿在圣何塞的33名矿工被困矿井综合图片。

definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
